Since you took care of Selvereth for us already, it'd be selfish of me to keep you here any longer, .

South of Firebase Audacity is the Divine Furnace, which Thulsa's elite Raven Troops have taken from us. Could you go help our soldiers there?

When you go across the bridge, you'll meet Krok at the Gravewatch of the Exiled. His arm is as strong as his opinions, I assure you.

They sent us one ? One? What are they thinking?

Are we just gonna let Thulsa make some horrible artifact of doom in there, or what?
